## üìù Pull Request Description

Please provide a clear and concise description of the changes you're proposing. Explain the purpose of this Pull Request and what problem it solves or what enhancement it brings to the `CloudCostControl-GlobalFreeTier-SaaS-PaaS-IaaS-Awesome-List`.

### Related Issues

Link to any related issues or discussions: #ISSUE-NUMBER (if applicable)

## üí° Type of Change

Please check the type of change your PR introduces:

- [ ] **New Entry**: Adding a new free-tier SaaS, PaaS, or IaaS offering.
- [ ] **Update Entry**: Modifying details of an existing free-tier offering (e.g., pricing, features, URL).
- [ ] **Removal**: Removing a deprecated, inaccurate, or no longer free-tier service.
- [ ] **Bug Fix / Typo**: Correcting a mistake or error in the documentation.
- [ ] **Refactor / Docs**: Improving structure, readability, or updating general project documentation.

## ‚úÖ Checklist for Contribution

Before submitting your Pull Request, please ensure you've completed the following:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/chirag127/CloudCostControl-GlobalFreeTier-SaaS-PaaS-IaaS-Awesome-List/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) guide.
- [ ] My changes adhere to the repository's formatting and style guidelines.
- [ ] All new or updated links are active and functional.
- [ ] The service(s) I'm adding/updating genuinely offer a free tier as described.
- [ ] I have provided all necessary details for new entries (category, service name, description, free-tier specifics, URL).
- [ ] I have reviewed my changes for clarity, accuracy, and completeness.
- [ ] I have ensured that my contribution does not duplicate existing entries.
